Articles.Content:
After building a pod racer for 0.90 it got me wanting moar, I would love to see all the different and crazy designs people can come up with for building these.

Make sure to provide pics/download links and let people know what mods you have used if any:wink:

**construction tips:** 

control wheels make things easier and try to avoid using any aerodynamic parts (wings/controls) they tend to mess with the thrust of jets when they pass behind them in 0.90 for some reason.

**Recommended mods:** 

Kerbal Attachment System.

[http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal...ent-system-kas](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/223900-kerbal-attachment-system-kas)

Kerbal foundries wheels and repolsors.

[https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/58/Kerba...epulsors_ALPHA](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/58/Kerbal_Foundries_Wheels_and_Repulsors_ALPHA)

And remember, the most important thing is that you have fun ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
